attributes.comment:
As a parent in the waiting phase of adopting an international child I understand the
financial burden adoption can place on a family. Many families don't even begin
the process of adoption for the sole reason of the cost. I have heard countless
families say they would love to adopt a child but they just can't afford it. For many
families, adoption is the only way they will be able to have children. Due to this, I
strongly urge you to reconsider raising the price of the U.S. Citizenship and
Immigration process of adoption. Many families who consider adoption are doing
all they can to pay the high fees to adoption agencies, foreign governments, and
travel. Please don't let our government be another stumbling block to these
parents waiting to bring their children home. Please consider keeping the
Immigration fees low.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Rachel L. Perry
